name: Easykanban
tagline: Easy  and basic kanban with html, jquery and css.
body:
### Easy kanban
This is a small,basic and easy kanban system in which you can have items and change its states. I used drop and drag on jQuery.
![My kanban](https://github.com/Kanban.Board.png).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
